input.sentences: and there were multi color ones .
and then there were some blue ones .
and then some pink ones too !
output.sentences: I avoid like the plague leaving my house on the forth of July because although fireworks are beautiful they are also dangerous.
Fortunately I can see them white flashes as the display begins from safely inside my apartment.
The excitement grows as indistinguishable multi color bursts fill the sky.
The color turns to blue as the show draws to a close.
And fireworks for this year with a brilliant pink boom.
